properties.name: recaptcha.validation.request-param-name
properties.description: The request parameter name for the reCAPTCHA response.

properties.name: recaptcha.validation.site-key
properties.description: The Google reCAPTCHA site key. Obtain from https://www.google.com/recaptcha/admin.

properties.name: recaptcha.validation.secret-key
properties.description: The Google reCAPTCHA secret key. Obtain from https://www.google.com/recaptcha/admin.
